archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Resource Configuration and Onboarding
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: Resource Configuration and Onboarding: When a resource is added (on boarded), this onboarding may be automated. There are several systems in the infrastructure that needs to be aware and integrated with the new resource. The �Resource Configuration and Onboarding� function will configure the on boarded Resources and the relevant systems to establish integration automatically, when requested.
